data.title: Barry Davis
data.text:
Buckley Community Schools

BA Central Michigan University

Also attended Alpena Community College

Played football and baseball

37 years coaching girls’ and boys’ basketball @ Buckley, Trenton, Avondale, Walled Lk. Central, Mount Morris, Grayling, Mesick, Wolverine, Kirtland CC, & Mich. Tech.

Record: 338-252, 11 conference championships & 2 district titles

6 years track and field coach-record: 47-30

Three years cross country coach-record: 52-7

Also coached baseball and junior varsity football

1972 Detroit News Cross Country COY, 1984 Traverse City Record Eagle & AP, & BCAM Basketball COY, Mich. Interscholastic Ath. Adm. Assoc.(MIAA) 15 years of dedicated service award, served on MHSAA soccer, basketball, and cross country comm.

Member Mich. Assoc. of Secon. Sch. Principals, MIAAA, MHSCA, and BCAM

Special thanks to the late Russell Thering former supt. Of Buckley Comm. Schools who gave him key support in coaching career

Wife: Cynthia Children: Kelley Peterson/Ryan Davis
